Where Ideas Meet Impact

Empowering innovation and excellence inside your classroom.

Mission

Our Why

The Digital Integration Office believes in the proficient development of Airmen and firmly conclude that our current systems and processes need transformed. We are dedicated to establishing a new standard of excellence for training within the 82 TRW.

How We Do It

We leverage our alliances with industry and innovative units across the DAF to cultivate a culture of innovation. We set transformation standards, actualize Airmen ideas, accelerate the adoption of emerging technolgy, and stimulate squadron innovation.

What we do

We execute the strategic objectives of the DAF, ADC, and 82 TRW. We serve as a central point for innovation information from the Wing Commander, all the way to the newest instructors, directing our efforts towards an end state that epitomizes modern learning and technology. We ensure that technology, learning delivery, and classroom environments truly transform our approach to developing Airmen, enabling us to deploy more Airmen for the great power competition.
